data.title: February 14-16, 2025 at the Sarasota Fairgrounds
data.meta_description: This music festival is organized by Suncoast Charities for Children. Headliners include Grand Funk Railroad and Creed Fisher.
data.text:
“A Fundraiser To Help Local Children, Teens, And Adults With Special Needs.”

SAVE THE DATE

FEBRUARY 14-16, 2025

The 27th Annual Thunder By The Bay Music & Motorcycle Festival is a three-day event held Feb. 14-16, 2025 at the Sarasota Fairgrounds that benefits Suncoast Charities for Children. National Headline Acts To Be Announced Soon. The Festival features continuous live music, vendors, daredevil acts, a charity motorcycle ride, bike show, a motorcycle “sound off” competition, biker games, and much more! On-site camping is also available. Admission is $15 in advance and $20 at the gate (12 and under free). Limited VIP tickets are also available. Over the past 26 years, the Festival has raised over $2.8 Million for charity.
